channel.title: Projects on Luke Bushell
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Luke Bushell

item.title: Project 1: Wine Quality Classifier
item.description: Project Overview Created a model which can classify whether a wine is good (rating above 7 out of 10) or bad (rating lower than 7 out of 10), with 95% accuracy using the physiochemical properties trained and optimised several models including Logistic Regression, Linear SVC, SVC with rbf-kernel, Random Forest Classifier and Gradient Boosting Classifier Built a basic API using Flask The best models were the Random Forest Classifier and Gradient Boosting Classifier.

item.title: Project 2: Autotrader Price Estimator
item.description: Project Overview Created a model which can estimate the price of a petrol power car Created preprocessing pipeline to scale and one hot encode input variables trained and optimised Lasso model with R2 value of 92.7% Link to GitHub Repository
